item.title: 仅一年多就将大幅增税
item.description:
《减税与就业法案》的制定者解释了这部即将到期的法律。【原文：

The architect of the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act explains the soon-to-expire law.

】

item.title: 仅一年多就将大幅增税
item.description: 仅一年多就将大幅增税【原文：The Big Tax Hike Coming in Just Over a Year】

item.title: 印度庞大的期权市场为何危及金融稳定？
item.description: 印度从股票衍生品市场的小角色跃升为全球最大的市场，而这一切都发生在短短五年之内。新的需求大多来自缺乏经验、喜欢冒险的散户投资者。【原文：India has gone from being a small player in the equity derivatives market to the world’s largest, all within just five years. Most of the new demand is coming from inexperienced retail investors with an appetite for risk.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚因批评性内容而禁止国家媒体的在线部门
item.description: 坦桑尼亚最大的媒体公司数字部门发布了一篇关于绑架批评国家领导人的人的动画片，之后该公司暂停了数字部门的业务。【原文：Tanzania has suspended the digital division of the nation’s biggest media house, after it released an animated piece about abductions of people critical of the nation’s leaders.】

item.title: 以下是伊朗最关键的石油和天然气基础设施地图
item.description: 以色列誓言对伊朗遭受的大规模导弹袭击进行报复，这使波斯湾的石油供应成为关注焦点，也使市场处于紧张状态。【原文：Israel’s vow to retaliate against Iran for a massive missile attack on the country is bringing a focus on oil supplies from the Persian Gulf, and keeping markets on edge.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀降至三年低点，支持瑞士央行进一步减息
item.description: 瑞士通胀率降至三年多来最慢，表明该国央行将进一步放宽货币政策。【原文：Swiss inflation weakened to the slowest pace in more than three years, pointing to further monetary easing by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 法国预算部长称将对最富有的 0.3% 征收临时税
item.description: 法国预算部长洛朗-圣马丁（Laurent Saint-Martin）表示，为帮助控制国家失控的公共财政而征收的临时税只对最富有的家庭和最大的公司产生影响。【原文：French Budget Minister Laurent Saint-Martin said temporary taxes to help rein in the country’s runaway public finances would hit only the very richest households and largest companies.】

item.title: 南非顶级银行首席执行官称投资者仍对南非经济反弹保持警惕
item.description: 近几个月来，南非的资产有所回升，但南非最大银行的负责人仍然认为，许多外国投资者仍持谨慎态度，他们在等待这个非洲大陆工业化程度最高的经济体兑现改革承诺。【原文：South African assets have rallied in recent months, yet the head of the country’s biggest bank still sees a cautious approach among many foreign investors who are waiting for the continent’s most industrialized economy to deliver on promised reforms.】

item.title: 巴尼耶誓言解决财政问题，法国将出售 120 亿欧元债券
item.description: 就在法国总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）公布控制政府不断膨胀的赤字和赢回投资者信心的详细计划的前几天，法国正在出售债券。【原文：France is selling bonds just days before Prime Minister Michel Barnier unveils detailed plans to control the government’s ballooning deficit and win back investor confidence.】

item.title: 贝利为更多降息敞开大门，英镑创两周新低
item.description: 在英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利发表鸽派言论后，英镑对美元汇率跌至两周来的最低点。【原文：The pound slid to its lowest in two weeks versus the dollar following dovish comments by Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数直播：英镑跌破 1.32 美元，创两周来新低
item.description: 一张英国 20 英镑纸币。摄影师迈尔斯-威利斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A British twenty pound banknote. Photographer: Miles Willis/Bloomberg】

item.title: 埃及加紧努力重新列入摩根大通重要债券指数
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃及正在加紧努力重新加入摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Egypt is stepping up efforts to rejoin a key JPMorgan Chase & Co. bond index that’s tracked by more than $200 billion worth of emerging-market funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 分析师称巴菲特瞄准日本银行和保险公司股票
item.description: 市场观察人士称，随着伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Market watchers are saying that Warren Buffett may be looking to buy Japanese financial firms and shipping companies as Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s return to the yen bond markets fuels speculation he’s raising money to build stakes in value stocks.】

item.title: 石破天惊，日元套利交易再成焦点
item.description: 以日元为中心的利差交易曾在 8 月份助长了市场崩溃，如今它又回到了投资者的视线中。【原文：A yen-centered carry trade that helped fuel a market meltdown in August is back on investors’ radars.】

item.title: Man Group 与澳大利亚财富基金的授权减少 10 亿美元
item.description: 根据澳大利亚主权财富基金外部管理人的最新披露，该基金与对冲基金公司 Man Group Plc 的巨额委托在今年上半年减少了约 15 亿澳元（10 亿美元）。【原文：Australia’s sovereign wealth fund’s giant mandate with hedge fund firm Man Group Plc fell by about A$1.5 billion ($1 billion) in the first half of this year, according to latest disclosures of its external managers.】

item.title: 中国经济学家建议出售 14 亿美元债券以刺激经济
item.description: 中国一位主要经济学家表示，中国可能会通过发行多达 10 万亿元人民币（合 1.4 万亿美元）的特别债务来加大对经济的财政支持，这反映出人们对中国政府扩大公共开支作为其经济刺激计划一部分的期望日益高涨。【原文：A leading economist in China said the country could ramp up fiscal support for the economy by issuing as much as 10 trillion yuan ($1.4 trillion) in special debt, reflecting rising expectations for Beijing to expand public spending as part of its stimulus package.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 市场需要十月惊喜来打破僵局
item.description:
投资者也不应指望再次大幅降息。【原文：

And investors shouldn’t count on another jumbo rate cut, either. 

】

item.title: 创纪录上涨后谨慎情绪升温，中国房地产股低迷
item.description: 中国开发商的股价在经历了史无前例的大涨之后出现暴跌，投资者重新评估该行业的风险，从而加剧了大盘的回调。【原文：Chinese developers’ shares plunged after an unprecedented rally, fueling a broader market retreat as investors reassessed the sector’s risks.】

item.title: 风险投资交易反映了投资者的选择性口味
item.description:
人工智能公司在第三季度获得了超过三分之一的资金。【原文：

Artificial intelligence firms received more than one-third of the funds in the third quarter. 

】

item.title: 软银之子设想未来几年人工智能管理家庭
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）创始人孙正义（Masayoshi Son）为人工智能的应用勾画了迄今为止最激进的时间表之一，他设想在不久的将来，人工智能技术将管理整个家庭。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. founder Masayoshi Son sketched out one of the most aggressive timelines for the adoption of artificial intelligence yet, envisioning a near future where the technology would run entire households.】

item.title: 投资转向中国，印度卢比将遭受更多损失
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 朗伯德国际管理公司（Lombard Odier IM）的亚洲基金削减了推动其繁荣的人工智能业务
item.description: 一位亚洲顶级基金经理今年主要通过人工智能相关科技股跑赢了 98% 的同行。【原文：A top Asia fund manager who has outperformed 98% of her peers this year largely with AI-related tech stocks is taking a breather on the hyped sector.】

item.title: 海湾能源和 Intouch 股票大涨，300 亿美元交易面临风险
item.description: 泰国亿万富翁萨拉特-拉塔纳瓦迪（Sarath Ratanavadi）的电力公司海湾能源开发公司（Gulf Energy Development Pcl）及其电信关联公司 Intouch 控股公司（Intouch Holdings Pcl）的股价飙升，可能会使这桩价值近 300 亿美元的合并案更加难以完成。【原文：A surge in the stock prices of Thai billionaire Sarath Ratanavadi’s power company Gulf Energy Development Pcl and its telecoms affiliate Intouch Holdings Pcl may make it more challenging for the almost $30 billion merger to get done.】

item.title: 印度放宽出口限制后大米创 16 年最大跌幅
item.description: 亚洲大米价格创下 16 年多来最大跌幅，原因是印度放宽部分出口限制后，市场对供应的担忧有所缓解。【原文：Rice prices tumbled the most in more than 16 years in Asia as concerns over supply eased after India relaxed some export restrictions.】

item.title: 石油期权显示市场因中东风险而进一步上涨
item.description: 石油期权显示，由于以色列和伊朗之间的敌对行动升级，能源基础设施或原油油轮成为攻击目标的风险上升，投资者押注油价将进一步上涨。【原文：Oil options show investors are betting prices will rise further as escalating hostilities between Israel and Iran raise the risk that energy infrastructure or crude tankers will be targeted.】

item.title: 科技股下滑，中国股市涨势在香港降温
item.description: 由于交易商在从 9 月份低点上涨超过 30% 后获利了结，香港中国股市下滑。【原文：Chinese stocks in Hong Kong slipped as traders took profit following gains of more than 30% from a September low.】

item.title: 印尼债券多头称一系列降息将带来反弹
item.description: 印尼本月政府换届，降息在即，印尼主权债券多头押注涨势将延续。【原文：Indonesian sovereign bond bulls are betting that a rally will extend on looming interest-rate cuts as the country undergoes a change in government this month.】

item.title: 台风 "克利斯朵夫 "逼近台湾 市场连续第二天关闭
item.description: 台风克拉森向台湾西海岸移动，预计将于当地时间中午前后登陆，证券交易所第二天关闭，数千人停电。【原文：Typhoon Krathon moved toward Taiwan’s west coast and is expected to make landfall around noon local time, with the stock exchange shutting a second day and thousands of people without power.】

item.title: 研究员称中国股市尚未赶上早先的中枢反弹
item.description: 由于对中国政府刺激措施的乐观情绪引发了中国股市的大幅反弹，中国股市相对于美国股市来说正处于上升阶段。DataTrek Research公司表示，如果以史为鉴，这轮反弹可能还有很长的路要走。【原文：Chinese stocks are on a roll relative to their US peers as optimism over Beijing’s stimulus measures triggered a dramatic rebound. If history is any guide, the rally may have a long way to go, DataTrek Research says.】
